# Welcome

I am Iniye Anthony, a GV300 student with a strong interest in political data analysis, experimental research, and statistical modelling in R.

This website presents selected work from my coursework, demonstrating my ability to design simulations, estimate causal effects, and communicate quantitative findings clearly.

---

## Academic Interests

- Causal inference and experimental design  
- Political communication and public opinion  
- Statistical modelling (OLS and logistic regression)  
- Data visualisation using ggplot2  

---

## Featured Work

My featured project explores an A/B test conducted by a political party to evaluate whether issue-focused messaging increases supporter signups.
